languages.text: {n}Недоумение прорастает во взоре служительницы.{/n} "Мы действуем согласно Его замыслу. Если Его знаки указали нам на человека — мы забираем его... Мы покорны. Разве должно быть иначе?"
{n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
languages.original_text: {n}Недоумение прорастает во взоре служительницы.{/n} "Мы действуем согласно Его замыслу. Если Его знаки указали нам на человека — мы забираем его... Мы покорны. Разве должно быть иначе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incomprehension fills the cultist's eyes.{/n} "Death of the body is true freedom and true salvation. It is the only way for a soul to begin a new life in the Undying One's embrace. Mercy is what we sow... Do you really see it differently?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultist stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "Death is freedom. It is the only way for a soul to achieve true salvation and begin a new life in the Undying One's embrace. We are an instrument of His mercy... Do you truly believe differently?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultist stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle vous dévisage d'un air incrédule.{/n} « Nous suivons Son dessein. Nous éliminons ceux qu'Il a marqués de Ses présages. Nous nous soumettons à Sa volonté. Comment pourrait-il en aller autrement ? »
languages.original_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle vous dévisage d'un air incrédule.{/n} « Nous suivons Son dessein. Nous éliminons ceux qu'Il a marqués de Ses présages. Nous nous soumettons à Sa volonté. Comment pourrait-il en aller autrement ? »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}La cultiste vous dévisage d'un air incrédule.{/n} « La mort est liberté. C'est le seul moyen pour une âme d'atteindre le véritable salut et d'entamer une nouvelle vie dans l'étreinte de l'Immortel. Nous ne sommes qu'un instrument de Sa miséricorde... Serait-il possible que vous pensiez différemment ? »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Te observa con expresión perpleja.{/n} «Seguimos Su plan. Tomamos a aquellos marcados por Sus presagios. Nos sometemos a Su voluntad. ¿Cómo podría no ser así?».
languages.original_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Te observa con expresión perpleja.{/n} «Seguimos Su plan. Tomamos a aquellos marcados por Sus presagios. Nos sometemos a Su voluntad. ¿Cómo podría no ser así?».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}La cultista te observa con expresión perpleja.{/n} «La muerte es libertad. Es la única forma de que un alma obtenga la verdadera salvación y comience una nueva vida en el abrazo del Inmortal. Somos un instrumento de Su piedad... ¿De verdad cree que no es así?».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}她困惑地盯着你。{/n}“我们遵循不死之神的指引，带走那些被祂打上烙印的人，服从祂的意志。若非如此，那还能怎么样呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她困惑地盯着你。{/n}“我们遵循不死之神的指引，带走那些被祂打上烙印的人，服从祂的意志。若非如此，那还能怎么样呢？”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的信徒困惑地盯着你。{/n}“死亡就是自由。只有死亡，才能带来真正的救赎，在不死之神的怀抱中开始新的生命。我们是祂传播仁慈的工具……莫非你不这么想吗？”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女は困惑してあなたを見つめている。{/n}「私たちは主のご意向に従っている。お告げによって示された者を奪っている。主のご意思に従っている。他に何があるというの？」
languages.original_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は困惑してあなたを見つめている。{/n}「私たちは主のご意向に従っている。お告げによって示された者を奪っている。主のご意思に従っている。他に何があるというの？」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}魔女団の信者たちは困惑してあなたを見つめている。{/n} 「死は自由です。魂が真の救いを得て、不死の方の抱擁の中で新しい人生を始める唯一の方法なのです。我々は神の慈悲の道具なのだ。そうでしょう？あなたは本当に、これが違うと思っているのですか？」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie starrt dich entsetzt an.{/n} "Wir folgen Seinem Weg. Wir holen jene, die Seine Omen bestimmen. Wir gehorchen Seinem Willen. Wie könnte es anders sein?"
languages.original_text: {n}She stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie starrt dich entsetzt an.{/n} "Wir folgen Seinem Weg. Wir holen jene, die Seine Omen bestimmen. Wir gehorchen Seinem Willen. Wie könnte es anders sein?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kultistin starrt dich entgeistert an.{/n} "Der Tod ist die Freiheit. Nur durch ihn kann eine Seele wahre Erlösung erlangen und ein neues Leben in den Armen des Todlosen beginnen. Wir sind ein Instrument seiner Gnade ... Glaubt Ihr wirklich etwas anderes?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The cultist stares at you in bewilderment.{/n} "We follow His design. We claim those marked by His omens. We submit to His will. How could it be otherwise?"
